DOC.brief_summary: The present study public health project aim treat overweight child 9-11 year age . After first consultation child randomize either continue treatment The Child Obesity Clinic , Child Department follow 2-3 consultation distance Lync . Last visit child Child Obesity Clinic approximately 12 month . Follow least 1 year perform .
DOC.detailed_description: This superiority study randomize trial two independent treatment arm . The target enrollment 50 % two treatment group . With 60 patient group , study 80 % statistical power 5 % significance level detect average difference treatment group intra-individual change BMI Z-score 0.51 x standard deviation intra-individual change . Previous data investigator group suggest reasonable estimate standard deviation intra-individual change BMI Z-score follow intervention 0.42 . Thus , study 80 % statistical power 5 % significance level detect difference intra-individual change BMI Z-score 0.51 x 0.42 = 0.21 average . The study present funding end follow June 2017 .
DOC.criteria: Children overweight obese accord definition develop Cole et al ( 4 ) . It imply include child follow age specific BMI Inclusion criteria 9 year = AGE < 9 year , 6 month AND 19,0 < BMI < 23,0 9 year , 6 month = > AGE < 10 Years AND 19,5 < BMI < 23,5 10 year = AGE < 10 year , 6 month AND 20,0 < BMI < 24,0 10 year , 6 months= > AGE < 11 year AND 20,5 < BMI < 24,5 11 year = AGE < 11 year , 6 month AND 21,0 < BMI < 25,5 11 year , 6 month = > AGE < 12 year AND 21,5 < BMI < 25,5 Children his/her parent able communicate Swedish . Children monogenic obesity Present le 80 % school late school year . No foster care child his/her brother sister
